CatDescriptText: Cutlines of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 9, 1972, pg. 9 reads: "U.L. Guild Fete - One of the season's smartest affairs was the Initial Dinner - Dance sponsored by the Urban League Guild of Pittsburgh. Held at the Allegheny Club in Three Rivers Stadium.  Arthur Edmunds, executive director of the League poses above with Mrs. Henry T. Bowe, publicity chairman (left) and Mrs. Mary Alexander, general chairman of the event. ""A Happy Trio - Attorney Ronald Davenport, Dean of Duquesne Law School and president of the Urban League Board, is flanked by two charmers in Mrs. Charles Chalfont, president of the Urban League Guild, and Mrs. Mildred Wade, co-chairman of the dinner - dance committee.  They are smiling over the success of the affair. - All Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Women and men, including Urban League CEO Arthur Edmunds, fourth from left, seated at banquet table 25 in the Allegheny Club for the Urban League Guild of Pittsburgh dinner dance, Three Rivers Stadium
